A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was just okay. Too many subplots that were completely pointless and boring (I'm looking at you casino scene). There were also scenes that were borderline weird (creepy milk/boob scene). The battle at the end was cool\, visually nice\, but then just ended with Rey.....vanishing?! Where'd she go? How'd she get back to the shop with Chewbacca?!? I feel like it was good enough for someone who's just a mediocre Star Wars fan.
